author: Special Correspondent
text:
The cross-examination of American-Pakistani terrorist David Coleman Headley may begin from February 25.

Defence attorney Wahab Khan on Monday informed the special court that he required four days to cross-examine Headley.

Mr. Khan, appearing for 26/11 attack handler Syed Zabiuddin Ansari alias Abu Jundal who is lodged at Arthur Road Jail on charges of conspiracy, told judge G.A. Sanap that he wished to begin the cross-examination from February 25 from 7 a.m. to 12 noon.

The court directed the prosecution to arrange for Headley’s deposition, currently in a prison in the U.S., via video conferencing.
title: Headley’s cross-examination likely from February 25
